pages.description: QuantCash is a web platform that provides an open community to make, test, evaluate, and compare quant algorithms written by various users.
roles: Developed a 'RelevantPages' component below a 'DocumentDetail' component and a 'RecommendationSideBar' component.
Improveed web response speed and user experience with API response caching, React Context, and session storage.
